title: Alarm for Cobra 11: Crash Time (addonia, mdf image)
description:
Alarm for Cobra 11: Crash Time

Status: v prodazhe s 1 nojabrja 2007 goda
ISO status: 2 nov 2007 
Type: Arcade / Racing (Cars) / 3D
Developer: Synetic
Publisher: RTL Entertainment
Platform: PC
 
Recommended system: 
 
* Windows XP with Service Pack 2 or better or Vista 32bit
* DirectX 9.0c (June 2007)
* Athlon XP / 64 3000+ or Pentium IV 2.4 GHz or better
* 512 MB RAM
* DirectX 9.0c compatible video card with at least 256 MB
* DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
* 4.2 GB free hard drive space
* DAEMON Tools PRO ADVANCED
 
Supported video cards: AGP 8x or PCI Express
 
* ATI Radeon 9800 Pro or better
* nVidia GeForce 6600 GT or better
with at least Shadermodel 2.0 and Hardware T & L
Not compatible with integrated video devices, laptops in particular.
 

Interface language: English / German
 
 
Description:
 
Smelye trjuki, zahvatyvajuwie avarii, volnujuwie ugolovnye dela! Vse bolel&#039;wiki skorostnogo zhanra legko vljubjatsja v samuju novuju igru, proishodjawuju iz original&#039;noj RTL TV-Show Alarm for Cobra 11. Razlichnye zahvatyvajuwie situacii zhdut igroka kak chast&#039; RTL TV-Show Alarm for Cobra 11. Reshenie ih trebuet, chtoby neskol&#039;ko raznoobraznyh missij byli uspeshno zakoncheny: jeto vertoletnye presledovanija, pryzhki poperek dvizhenija poezdov ili probegov razvedki - pervosortnoe razvlechenie garantiruetsja!
 
Nepredskazuemye missii osvobozhdajut ot sledov nabora i protivnikov, kotorye iwut, ih sobstvennye zapasnye vyhody blagodarja novym svedenijam delajut gonki i dinamicheskimi i podlinnymi, i ne tol&#039;ko voshitjat poklonnikov gonochnogo zhanra. Novye obshirnye scenarii, polnye shosse, proselochnyh dorog i gorodskih ulic dobavljajut k raznoobraziju v igre, i nichto ne pomeshaet issledovaniju igrokom okruzhajuwih sred i ih tajn.
 
Osobennosti igry:
 
* Bolee 50-ti ochen&#039; raznoobraznyh zadach i 3 urovnja slozhnosti
* Single race mode bol&#039;she chem na 40 tracks
* Srazhenie protiv vashih druzej pri pomowi razdelenija jekrana
* Dva ogromnyh, wedro razrabotannyh mira igry, kazhdyj pokaz bol&#039;she chem 100 km dorogi
* Novyj iskusstvennyj intellekt protivnika
* Novye trjuki i dejstvija, naprimer pryzhki cherez skaly
* Zahvatyvajuwaja sistema pereigrovki
* Polnost&#039;ju peredelana graficheskaja sistema i mnogochislennye novye vizual&#039;nye jeffekty.

USE DHT!
